answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hello:
I found some resources that may help you.
This is a link to a website all about bird control: http://the-bird-control.info/tips-on-pigeon-control/
This is a PDF that is about bird control and at the bottom you will find many additional resources and links: http://clearroads.org/tsrroostingbirds.pdf
Peggy Chasler
Knowledge Network Intern
pchasler@icma.org

author: Unknown
text: I live in a Kansas community of roughly 25,000 people. Our downtown district (essentially 3.5 streets stretched out over 10 blocks) is currently experiencing an influx of pigeons. Naturally, their droppings are becoming a major concern. In your experience, what has been the most effective way of dealing with this problem? Are long term solutions (poison, sterilization) any better or more cost effective than short term solutions (spike strips, ultrasonic repellents, etc.)?
title: Pigeon control
